site_name: The Castle Centre Broomhouse LaneLondonSW6 3DP
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation to part of the wording of conditions 4, 6, 8, 9 and 10 of planning application ref: 2019/00733/LBC granted 28th April 2020 for the 'Alterations and extensions to the Grade II listed building including the demolition of the summer house, erection of a part-one, part-two and part-three storey extension and excavation of a partial basement beneath the extension, in connection with the use of the site as a 33-bedroom nursing home (Use Class C2)  together with the demolition and replacement of front and side boundary walls, and re-instatement of a means of access to the highway on Daisy Lane.' Amendment to part of the wording of condition 4 to change from 'Prior to the commencement of any works' to 'Prior to the commencement of any works to the listed building', amendments to part of the wording of conditions 6, 8, and 10 from 'Prior to the commencement of any works' to 'Prior to the commencement of relevant works to the Listed Building', amendment to the wording of condition 9 from 'Prior to the relevant part of the works commencing, a method Statement for the protection of internal and external architectural details and historic building fabric' to 'Prior to the commencement of relevant works commencing, the following Method Statements for the protection of architectural details and historic building fabric during the works shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council : A) a method Statement for the protection of internal architectural details and historic building fabric shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council prior to commencement of relevant works to the Listed Building, B) a method Statement for the protection of external architectural details and historic building fabric shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council prior to commencement of any works on site.'
